entry.title: No Bridge Unburnt
entry.summary:
Author: Voidwalker

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,597Chapters: 2/4Kudos: 120

Summary: After returning from patrol, Damian didn’t make the decision to shower down in the cave with any specific reason in mind. Apart from Drake, he was supposed to be alone, as everybody else had been otherwise engaged, and Drake always made it a point not to stay in the cave any longer than he absolutely had to. He would surely leave for his Nest imminently. Whether Damian showered in the cave or in his ensuite bathroom should’ve made no difference at all. Contrary to his expectations, he heard the door to the showers open and then close again, and tensed as he realised what that meant. Damnation!
